trans-unit.source: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applied to its class definition.
trans-unit.target: 添付プロパティを指定だけを持つ別の特定要素で参照できる[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]そのクラス定義に適用します。

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
trans-unit.target: 用語の意味`browsable`この説明で使用されている[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]の指定された説明に似ています<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>、添付プロパティの参照可能な状態のプロパティの情報に特に関連するが、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]添付プロパティは、主にあるため、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念</xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions.
trans-unit.target: これは、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]添付プロパティの定義の get アクセサーでのみ適用する必要があります。

trans-unit.source: Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor.
trans-unit.target: これは適用されません[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]set アクセサーにします。

trans-unit.source: Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior.
trans-unit.target: 設定操作の参照可能にすることは直感的に[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]関連の要素が存在して、実際の動作を制御する要素を定義するプロパティの get アクセサーの特性。

trans-unit.source: For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 添付プロパティの宣言の概要については、次を参照してください。[添付プロパティの概要](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)です。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> is applied..
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>の[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]添付プロパティをクラスで参照できるようにするためにクラスを適用する必要があります、 <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref>が適用される..</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.
trans-unit.target: 型を取得、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]クラスを適用する必要があります。

trans-unit.source: The AttributeType value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.
trans-unit.target: AttributeType 値でのみ設定できる、`attributeType`のパラメーター、<xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]コンス トラクター</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> 。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 決定するかどうか、現在<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]が指定したオブジェクトと等しい。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: この実装は、この属性では、 <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>によって公開される&1; つの可能な設定可能な値の値の等価性をサポートしています

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>場合、指定した<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref>が現在に等しい<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref>、それ以外の<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: このハッシュ コードを返します<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]です。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: この実装は、この属性では、 <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>によって公開される&1; つの可能な設定可能な値に基づく複数のハッシュ値をサポートしています
符号なし 32 ビット整数値。
